Equally as attractive as its surroundings, our apartments come equipped with oversized windows offering breathtaking views, high ceilings, spacious floor plans, and some of the most well-designed living spaces in Boston.

The space
Guests can enjoy beautiful apartment homes with high ceilings, oversized windows, gourmet kitchens with granite counter-tops, and much more.
